com.quantego.clp

Class CLPExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quantego.clp.CLPExpression

  • public class CLPExpression
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class to create the left-hand side of a CLPConstraint. Use CLP#buildExpression() to create a new instance.
    Author:
    Nils Loehndorf
